Class ReportGenerator

java.lang.Object
org.stockmanager.service.ReportGenerator
public class ReportGenerator extends Object
Responsible for generating and displaying various reports related to the user's portfolio, transaction history, and profit/loss analysis. Utilizes portfolio and market data to provide insights.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    ReportGenerator(PortfolioManager portfolioManager, StockApiService apiService)
    Constructs a new ReportGenerator with the specified PortfolioManager and StockApiService.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    displayPortfolioSummary()
    Displays a summary of the user's current portfolio holdings and cash balance.
    void
    displayProfitLossReport()
    Displays a profit/loss report for each stock holding based on current market prices.
    void
    displayTransactionHistory()
    Displays the user's transaction history, sorted by time (most recent first).

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • ReportGenerator

      public ReportGenerator(PortfolioManager portfolioManager, StockApiService apiService)
      Constructs a new ReportGenerator with the specified PortfolioManager and StockApiService.
      Parameters:
      portfolioManager - The portfolio manager providing access to the user's data.
      apiService - The service for fetching current stock market data.

  • Method Details

    • displayPortfolioSummary

      public void displayPortfolioSummary()
      Displays a summary of the user's current portfolio holdings and cash balance. Fetches current market prices for valuation.

    • displayTransactionHistory

      public void displayTransactionHistory()
      Displays the user's transaction history, sorted by time (most recent first).

    • displayProfitLossReport

      public void displayProfitLossReport()
      Displays a profit/loss report for each stock holding based on current market prices.
